name: Star Wars: Legacy Volume 2
summary: Star Wars: Legacy Volume 2, alternatively styled as Star Wars: Legacy Volume II or simply Star Wars: Legacy, is a comic series set in the Legacy era. It is a sequel to and shares a name with the original Star Wars: Legacy.[6] Written by Corinna Bechko and Gabriel Hardman, penciled by Hardman, colored by Rachelle Rosenberg, and published by Dark Horse Comics, it stars Ania Solo, a descendant of Han and Leia Organa Solo. The first issue was released in March 2013. The series ended with issue #18, as Marvel Comics replaced Dark Horse as the publisher of Star Wars comics.
info:
• 中文名: 星球大战：传承第2部
  • 册数: 18
  • 出版社: Dark Horse Comics
  • 别名: Star Wars: Legacy Volume II
  • 发售日: 2013-03-20
  • 完结日: 2014-08-27
